heading: Hoisting machine operator license required
text:
It shall be unlawful for any persons to take charge of or operate any power-
operated hoisting machine used for hoisting purposes or cableways under the jurisdiction of the department, unless such person is
licensed under the provisions of this article or is a holder of a certificate of qualification as a hoisting machine operator issued prior
to December 6, 1968 and not allowed to lapse.
  Exceptions:
      1. Operators of mobile cranes of a limited size and capacity exempted from the requirements of this article under chapter 33
         of the New York city building code, or exempted in accordance with rules promulgated by the commissioner.
      2. Hoisting machines with a manufacturerâ€™s rated capacity of one ton or less.

      3. Power-operated scaffolds and window-washing machines.
